EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: On-Site GISLink Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 22, 2011 Webinar On-Site GISLink Training
Please join us for the upcoming webinar: On-Site GISLink Training on Thursday, September 22nd at 10 AM Pacific Time (12 NOON Central | 1 PM Eastern).
Given the critical importance of GIS in VisiCAD and VisiNet Mobile, when was the last time your team had any formal training in GISLink? TriTech offers on-site GISLink training in which TriTech’s GISLink expert guides your GIS team with step-by-step hands-on instruction to refine your workflow and processes for performing GIS updates in TriTech products. The comprehensive two day class includes a thorough overview of GISLink and Flat File Maker with an agenda customized to your system configuration and problem areas.
In this upcoming webinar, you'll learn about: -Overview of GISLink -Sample GISLink Training Agenda -Benefits of On-Site GISLink Training
*If you are having difficultly viewing the "Register Now" button above, please copy and paste the below URL into your internet browser: http://offers.tritech.com/OnSiteGISLinkTraining_09_22_2011_Registration.html
Questions? Contact Jenny Clavero in the TriTech Marketing Department (858) 799-7362 or email jenny.clavero@tritech.com
﻿
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
